column2: BRIEF-PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.35 May 3 (Reuters) - PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust : * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.30 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY NET INVESTMENT INCOME OF $75.7 MILLION, DOWN 19 PERCENT FROM PRIOR QUARTER * BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE OF $20.24 AT MARCH 31, 2018, UP FROM $20.13 AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
